Мой научный руководитель ищет себе ассистента для работы в области RS в Больцано (Италия). Может кому-то интересно. Готов ответить на вопросы, если они у вас появятся :slightly_smiling_face:

*Вакансия:* Assistant Professor Position on Recommender Systems
*Название учреждения:* Free University of Bozen-Bolzano (FUB)
*Город:* Больцано (Италия)
*Описание:*

The Database and Systems Engineering (IDSE) research center, at Free University of Bozen-Bolzano (Italy) is looking for an Assistant Professor (depending on qualification) with research interests in the area of Recommender Systems. The position is starting from Spring 2020.

IDSE is active in a number of research projects in this area and in particular on: learning conversational policies for recommender systems, group recommender systems, learning user models from interaction data, global evolution of recommender systems, mobile and context-aware recommender systems applications in tourism, media, and eHealth.

We are looking for an exceptional candidate with the following characteristics:

• established track record of creating and publishing results of high research quality
• strong technical skills and strong experience of programming
• substantial mathematical background
• experience of working on international projects
• excellent presentation skills
• PhD and good research and teaching experience

The start date for this position will be in spring 2020 or as soon as possible after that. The assistant professor position is for 3 years renewable. We have been able to generate continuous funding stream, and the successful candidate will be encouraged to contribute to, and benefit from the continuation of this funding.

Interested candidates please send informal inquiries, your CV (including publication list) and links to selected papers to: Francesco Ricci (<mailto:fricci@unibz.it|fricci@unibz.it>)

For more information,
IDSE at FUB: <https://www.inf.unibz.it/idse/>
Recommender Systems: <http://www.inf.unibz.it/~ricci/>

*Вилка зарплат (EUR):*
The salary is defined according to the professional qualification. From a minimum of 42K to a maximum of 74K
A reasonable candidate should get easily from 50K to 60K.
